_sText:
SEXXED UP VERSION OF MY FIRST MAP. EVAR.


Its fast, hectic.. its got one hell of a lot of bombs..

its pitchblack!!

do you go in guns-a-blazing, torch on? or do you try the sneaky aproach, and hunt down your prey silently before knifing them in the back?

with de_pitchblack, the choice is yours.

it also has curvy pillars.

N.B.: 
> there are 24 spawn points, but it gets a little insane when theres more than 8 =D

> the bombsite is located in the middle, underneath the pulsating spotlight. Every terrorist starts with a bomb.

> ALLOW FLASHLIGHTS FOR THIS MAP xD

> the walls between the pillars are breakable, with 100hp. Use this to your advantage, and surprise enemies

Oh, and BTW, big shout out to m3h, who introduced me to hammer and helped me work on this map originally

GOOD LUCK, SOLDIER
